text: Sure, I can help you with that. Can you please provide me with your username and password for authorization purposes?
My username is user3 and my password is user3pass.
Thank you. One moment while I authenticate your account.
Your account has been authenticated successfully. Now, please confirm that you want to delete your account.
Yes, I want to delete it.
Your account has been deleted successfully. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
